# Installing Section 
 

```{r message=FALSE, warning= FALSE}


install.packages("ggplot2", repos="http://cran.rstudio.com/")
install.packages("tidyverse", repos="http://cran.rstudio.com/")

```





```{r message=FALSE, warning= FALSE}


library(ggplot2)
```
